response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I understand its true worth to be $10,000. However, to facilitate a transaction and accommodate your budget, I am offering this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially save you thousands in the long run. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you're ready to proceed with this fantastic deal.", "product_price": 9500}
